response.original_title: The Science of Rhythm Guitar - Paul Jackson Jr.
response.overview: Welcome to Paul Jackson Jr's I Came to Play "The Science of Rhythm Guitar" video. Why does Paul Jackson.Jr's telephone ring so much? Michael Jackson knows, Quincy Jones, David Foster, Whitney Houston, Barbra Streisand, George Duke, Luther Vandross and George Benson know as well They all know that this Grammy-nominated composer, arranger, producer and guitarist is one of the most recorded and requested guitatist in the world. And these megastars know that when they want the best on their music projects, Paul gees the call Learn some of the best kept secrets of R & B Rhythm Guitar playing Paul Jackson. Jr. brings over 20 years of recording experience right to your VCR. In this video you will learn the techniques needed for great rhythm, how to dissect a chord into simple parts, the concept of space, and what tole effects play in a song These are techniques that Paul has used on countless gold and multi- platinum recordings
response.title: The Science of Rhythm Guitar - Paul Jackson Jr.
